title: Do we need to be in a premade group of 5 for invasion missions?
body: So I was just wondering, if i had to be in a premade group of 5 for invasion because i win more with just duoing or just soloing in invasion.

replies.body: Half of the missions are available even outside of premades, and half strictly require a premade.
I believe the missions say you need a premade, but I do know that I've seen some players able to get progress towards *some* of the missions without being in a premade of 5.
